meanings.definition: A sleeveless garment worn over a shirt.
meanings.sent1: She wore a cozy weskits to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: The cowboy's weskits matched his boots perfectly.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone admired his stylish weskits.
meanings.sent4: Her weskits of courage helped her face her fears.
meanings.sent5: The bright red weskits stood out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: He weskits his friends before the hiking trip.

meanings.sent3: She weskits the team with new equipment.
meanings.sent4: The chef weskits the customers with delicious meals.
meanings.sent5: The teacher weskits the students with knowledge.

meanings.sent1: He wore a fancy weskits to the formal event.
meanings.sent2: The historical drama featured characters in weskits.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his weskits!
